ygData.subject: RE: Rumor of the bards ultimate weapon?
ygData.msgSnippet: PoH was opened this weekend.  That was the reason for all the undead all over the place and the GM events on all the servers - PoH was opened and released hell
ygData.messageBody:
PoH was opened this weekend. That was the reason for all the undead all
over the place and the GM events on all the servers - PoH was opened and
released hell spawn onto Norrath.

Astur il'Ayan, Cleric of Brell
SCARAB on Solusek Ro


> -----Original Message-----
> From: David Knadler [mailto:dknadler@...]
> Sent: Wednesday, October 27, 1999 1:53 PM
> To: eqbards@onelist.com
> Subject: RE: [eqbards] Rumor of the bards ultimate weapon?
> Importance: Low
>
>
> From: David Knadler <dknadler@...>
>
> >> A fellow bard has heard rumor of a bard only "ultimate"
> > weapon called the
> > quill that procs gate. He says it is found in the Plane of
> > Hate on the
> > Maestro of Rancor.
>
> Plane of Hate? I thought that wasn't going to be "open" to the general
> public until march (when, allegedly, the expansion is coming out).
>
> Desmei Sightblinder
> Lvl 30 Bard [Povar]
>
> > Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to
> toren@... with the subject lol.
>
